mapper.select: select ta.mid , mpw ,sno ,mname , ta.auth from (select tm.mid mid , tm.mpw mpw , ts.sno sno ,tm.email mname from tbl_manager tm left join tbl_store ts on tm.mid = ts.mid where ts.mid = #{mid} and enable = 1 union all select amid mid, ampw mpw, '0' sno, amname mname from tbl_admin where amid = #{mid} union all select adid mid, adpw mpw, '0' sno, '광고주' mname from tbl_adv where adid = #{mid} ) tl left join tbl_auth ta on tl.mid = ta.mid
